name: 5 Days North Of Vietnam Package
summary: Hanoi, Halong bay, Sapa, Tam Coc are the most popular places in all North of Vietnam. With all inclusive tour, Vietnam Travel Top will bring you to all them and guarantee your satisfaction. Please note that this tour consists of a combination of day tours, so you may have different tour guides on different days and you will meet different people during the activities.
highlights: Swim in the emerald waters of the stunning Ha Long Bay
Explore the emerald waters by kayak or bamboo boat
Learn more about rice cultivation in the mountain areas

timeline.title: Day 01 Hanoi Arrival – Check in Hotel (in Hanoi Old Quarter). – Welcome drink.
timeline.description:
In and around HanoiPick up from the Noi Bai airport and then transfer you to the hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter – the most exciting place for tourist. After that you are free to visit Hanoi City by yourself.  Note: Check in time is 13:00 P.M.  Our people will greet and brief all information around the trip.Start point
 Hanoi old quarter, Hanoi, Vietnam 07:00 - 08:00

timeline.title: Day 02 Hanoi – Halong overnight on cruise (B/L/D)
timeline.description: Morning: Shuttle bus picks you up from your hotel at 8:00am. Enjoy a scenic drive to Halong Bay with lush green paddy fields and romantic rivers. Embark on Cruise by noon for a short cruise briefing and check-in.  Afternoon: Savour a delectable lunch as Cruises amongst the limestone islands. In the afternoon, we will stop at Surprise Cave, the most impressive cave in Halong Bay. Climb up the stairs and be thrilled by what Mother Nature has crafted here. Later return to main boat and continue cruising further into the Bay to Titop Island. Have a shower to relax then you can join us in our cooking class in the dining room or sunset party on sundeck. For the rest of the night, socialize with other guests, fish for squid, or just laze around. Overnight on board.

timeline.title: Day 03 Halong – Hanoi (B/L)
timeline.description: Start your day with morning Tai Chi exercises a photo hunt on the sundeck.  Have a light breakfast with coffee and tea and cake then head toward the Luon Cave. Come back to the ship and check out of your cabin while the farewell party is ready at the dining room. Passing famous sites like Ba Hang Fishing Village, Dog Islet on the way back to Ha Long Harbour.

timeline.title: Day 04 Hanoi - Hoa Lu & Tam Coc (Meals: B/L)
timeline.description: 08:00 Picking up from hotel/stay. 08:30 Starting drive to Ninh Binh Province 10:00 Arriving at Hoa Lu Ancient Capital 10:15 Visiting King Dinh and King Le’s temples. 11:30 Arriving in Tam Coc Wharf. 11:45 Having buffet lunch with Vietnamese Cuisine. 13:00 Getting on Sampan boats through caves and visiting countryside landscape 15:00 Back to Tam Coc Wharf to chill out. 15:15 Biking on country road around village 16:00 Getting on shuttle bus to go back to Hanoi 18:30 Saying goodbye to you at your hotel/stay

timeline.title: Day 05 Hanoi - Back Home (B)
timeline.description:
Breakfast at the hotel then free and easy. Wait until our driver come and pick you to the airport.  Trip ends.End point
 Hanoi old quarter, Hanoi, Vietnam 15:00 - 17:00

name: Best 7 Days North of Vietnam
summary: Hanoi, Halong bay, Sapa, Tam Coc are the most popular places in all North of Vietnam. With all inclusive tour, Vietnam Travel Top will bring you to all them and guarantee your satisfaction. Please note that this tour consists of a combination of day tours, so you may have different tour guides on different days and you will meet different people during the activities.
highlights: Swim in the emerald waters of the stunning Ha Long Bay
Explore the emerald waters by kayak or bamboo boat
Bicycle and Riverboat tour of Ninh Binh

timeline.title: Day 1: Airport pick up - Check in hotel in Hanoi
timeline.description:
In and around HanoiPick up the airport and then transfer you to the hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter – the most exciting place for tourist. After that you are free to visit Hanoi City by yourself.

Note: Check in time is 13:00 P.M.

Our people will greet and brief all informationa round the trip.

note: Flight is not included in the price, whenever you arrive Noi Bai Airport, we will pick you up subjext to your flight time provided.Start point
 Hanoi old quarter, Hanoi, Vietnam 07:00 - 08:00

timeline.title: Day 2: Hanoi – Halong bay – Overnight on Cruise (B, L, D)
timeline.description: Morning: Shuttle bus picks you up from your hotel at 8:00am. Enjoy a scenic drive to Halong Bay with lush green paddy fields and romantic rivers. Embark on Cruise by noon for a short cruise briefing and check-in. Afternoon: Savour a delectable lunch as Cruises amongst the limestone islands. In the afternoon, we will stop at Surprise Cave, the most impressive cave in Halong Bay. Climb up the stairs and be thrilled by what Mother Nature has crafted here. Later return to main boat and continue cruising further into the Bay to Titop Island. Have a shower to relax then you can join us in our cooking class in the dining room or sunset party on sundeck. For the rest of the night, socialize with other guests, fish for squid, or just laze around. Overnight on board.

timeline.title: Day 3: Halong Bay - Hanoi - Check in hotel in Hanoi (Meal: B, L )
timeline.description: Start your day with morning Tai Chi exercises a photo hunt on the sundeck.  Have a light breakfast with coffee and tea and cake then head toward the Luon Cave. Come back to the ship and check out of your cabin while the farewell party is ready at the dining room. Passing famous sites like Ba Hang Fishing Village, Dog Islet on the way back to Ha Long Harbour.

timeline.title: Day 4: Hanoi - Sapa by bus - Cat Cat village – Sapa Hotel (L, D)
timeline.description:
6.30 – 7.00: Pick up from your hotel/stay, get on big bus and depart for Sapa.

9.30: Follow the highway to Lao Cai city with the first comfort break

11.00: Second comfort break at Lao Cai city before approaching Sapa

13.00: Arrive Sapa Town with colorful traditional costums of H’mong, Dzao, Tay ethnic People.

Welcome drink and itinerary briefing

Enjoy the lunch with local Vietnamese dishes, check-in procedures

14.30: A short drive to the gate of Cat Cat village which is home of Black H’mong ethnic people and is located near the bottom of a deep valley at the foot of Fansipan Peak. Our local guide will show you the daily life activities of the locals, trek down to the valley bottom to the waterfall where the French built a Hydraulic Power Station; stop for photo with bridge and waterfall then you will walk uphill for bus to pick up to get back to Sapa in the afternoon.

Trekking distance is about 2.5 kms and it lasts for 2 hours

17.00: Come back to Sapa Town. Have dinner and overnight in hotel.

timeline.title: Day 5: Sapa - Y Linh Ho - Lao Chai - Ta Van – Hanoi (B/L)
timeline.description:
7.00 – 7.45: Have breakfast at hotel and prepare light pack for trekking

8.00: A short drive to Y Linh Ho then trek through the rice terraces and along Muong Hoa Stream to the Black Hmong village of Lao Chai to see the spectacular landscape of Hoang Lien Son Mountain after that heading to Ta Van village - home of Dzay ethnic people.

Trekking distance is about 9 kms and it lasts for 3.5 hours

11.30: Bus picks you up at Ta Van Bridge to Sapa.

12.00 – 15.00: Have a shower at hotel, check out and have lunch and time at leisure on your own.

15.00: Meet all group members at hotel to get ready for Hanoi.

15.15: Get on bus to go back to Hanoi with comfort break.

21.15: Transfer to and Check in hotel in Hanoi

timeline.title: Day 6: Hoa Lu Tam Coc 1 day tour (B/ L)
timeline.description:
8.00 – 8.30 am:  Picking up from hotel/stay.

08:30 Starting drive to Ninh Binh Province

10:00 Arriving at Hoa Lu Ancient Capital

10:15 Visiting King Dinh and King Le’s temples.

11:30 Arriving in Tam Coc Wharf.

11:45 Having buffet lunch with Vietnamese Cuisine.

13:00 Getting on Sampan boats through caves and visiting countryside landscape

15:00 Back to Tam Coc Wharf to chill out.

15:15 Biking on country road around village

16:00 Getting on shuttle bus to go back to Hanoi

18:30 Saying goodbye to you at your hotel in Hanoi.

Note: Sometimes, we will switch to visit Tam Coc first and then Hoa Lu.

timeline.title: Day 7: Hanoi Departure (B)
timeline.description:
We will arrange car to airport for you, please advise your flight details.

If you need any further arrangement: tour to Hoi an, Ho Chi Minh City…please advise.End point
 Hanoi old quarter, Hanoi, Vietnam 17:00 - 18:00
